name: RecordLogix
overview:
RecordLogix, Inc. is a privately held Delaware Corporation, based in Redwood City, California, in the Silicon Valley that provides secure documents and records management Cloud Computing and Software as a Service solutions.

The business concept of RecordLogix is centered around developing and marketing software that allows law firms, in-house legal departments, and legal departments within the public sector, to effectively manage their physical and electronic documents and records, so as to streamline the records management process, making for a more efficient, profitable, and environmentally friendly organization.
